abstract.t: This draft specifies a fault management indications for MPLS Transport Profile(MPLS-TP) Label Switched Paths (LSPs). The notification mechanism employs a generic method for a Maintenance End Point (MEP) or Maintenance Intermediate Point (MIP) to indicate a fault on an MPLS-TP LSP. A new MPLS Operation, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) message is defined.
